name: TaxJurisdiction
description: Geographic tax jurisdiction with hierarchical structure. Represents countries, states, provinces, cities, or postal code zones with their tax authority information.

properties.name: code
properties.description: Unique jurisdiction code (ISO country, state code, city code)

properties.name: parentJurisdiction
properties.description: Parent jurisdiction for hierarchical structure (e.g., Paris → Île-de-France → France)

properties.name: taxAuthorityName
properties.description: Name of the tax authority for this jurisdiction

properties.name: taxAuthorityWebsite
properties.description: Official website of the tax authority
